PathnamesPage.description:
Paths are also internationalized.

If you use the default language, English, you will see /en/pathnames in the browser's address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL will be localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).
PathnamesPage.title: Paths

savings.title: Energy Savings
savings.description: Generate your own power to cut monthly bills.

eco.title: Eco-friendly
eco.description: Use renewable energy to reduce carbon footprint and combat climate change.

value.title: Property Value Increase
value.description: Solar panels can increase home value, attracting buyers.

independence.title: Energy Independence
independence.description: Less affected by price swings, your home enjoys better energy security.

enhanceSection.title: Enhance Your Energy Utilization with Photovoltaic Technology

section1.title: Join the Energy Transition
section1.description: Photovoltaics are key to cutting your electricity bill and protecting the planet. Invest in solar panels to turn sunlight into power, reducing reliance on fossil fuels. It saves energy costs and boosts property value. With proper optimization, your home can be a model of sustainability.

section2.title: Professional Team at Your Service
section2.description: For a successful photovoltaic project, you need experts. Our network has pros in system installation. Their skills and experience help them understand project challenges. They'll assist with equipment choice, panel orientation, and installation. Craftsmen across regions offer nearby help.

section3.title: Customized Solutions for You
section3.description: We focus on your energy needs. Our artisans provide tailored services: Solar Panel Installation: Specialists use quality equipment for a smooth setup so you can generate power. - Profitability Study: Know potential savings first. Experts analyze your consumption to check project profitability. - Maintenance and Monitoring: We offer contracts to ensure panel longevity. Regular checks optimize long-term energy production.

section4.title: Get Free Quotes Easily
section4.description: Planning a photovoltaic project? Act now! Fill a simple form for up to 5 free quotes from qualified artisans. It's quick, easy, and free of obligation. Provide project details, and in days, you'll get personalized proposals to optimize investment. Compare to choose the best option.

cta.title: Don't Hesitate to Take the First Step
cta.description: Investing in photovoltaics is investing in your future and the planet's. Be active and request free quotes now to get the best deals. Let's make your project happen!

who.question: Who are we?
who.answer: Nextimmo positions itself as an innovative real estate agency with the vision of redefining the Luxembourg real estate market to simplify the processes of buying, selling, and renting properties. Striving for a balance between a human approach and technological evolution, our agency progresses daily to offer innovative solutions to our clients and partners.
